Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay in Venice”
Reviews.Author: Mohamed N
Reviews.Content: stayed venice 3days november found hotel clean quiet clean nice bathrooms breakfast till 1000 stuff helpful try bad internet free compared surrounding hotels star heating system freezing couldnt fix decorations nice hotel downtown 1015minutes walking hotel city center venice reached taking bus station hotel 15minutes reach arrival airport bus stop front hotel directly dont walk alot overall nice save money middle position downtown venice island

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jessica C
Reviews.Content: cleanliness hotel clean quiet size cleaned day towels changed day decor outdated cozy heating control unfortunately 2 electric plugs fridge bathroom service staff spoke english helpful information electrical adapter stay breakfast 7 10 abundant freshly checked 8 am day luggages 1pm location bus stop outside hotel bus mestre centre train station hotel bus stop bus venice piazzale roma 10 mins buses frequent night youre staying carnival ideal book central hotel venice mestre hour reach mestre water bus piazza san marco rialto piazzale roma bus mestre hand mestre ideal shopping hm clarks etc travel cities verona terms value paid 360 euros 4 nights 2 persons considering carnival cheap

Reviews.Title: “Front Desk Serive is not ideal and toilet lock needs to be replaced”
Reviews.Author: SylviaGwee
Reviews.Content: booked triple type available internet booking arrived front desk suggested quad sharing naturally expected reduction price decided stay triple toilet water tends flow shower shielded using shower curtains lock mum locked toilet couldnt
